EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.LA_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Santa Monica. For those attending the Data Science Workshop, please remember to bring your own laptop.
Please note that the venue has changed, and the event will be held at: BLANKSPACES Santa Monica 1450 2nd St, Santa Monica, CA 90401
Date: Wednesday, 7 June 2017
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 5:30pm Sessions
Location:
BLANKSPACES Santa Monica 1450 2nd St, Santa Monica, CA 90401 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/BLANKSPACES+Santa+Monica/@34.0136543,-118.4961339,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x54db13f291c89878?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjzoaG006fUAhXJhVQKHYPZDTMQ_BIIejAK]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/losangeles?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
PARKING
There is a City of Santa Monica parking structure that is across the street: Parking Structure 6, 1431 2nd St, Santa Monica 90401
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
